original_title: 14 injured after bus overturns in Galahitiya
original_body_lines: At least 14 passengers have been injured and hospitalised due to a road accident involving a private passenger bus travelling from Colombo to Monaragala in the Galahitiya area on the Ratnapura – Embilipitiya this morning (30).
The accident has taken place after the bus overturned on the road between 5.00 a.m. to 6.00 a.m. this morning, as a result of the driver falling asleep on the wheel.
